short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab extension that allows new features in the browsers new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Increditab extension replaces your new tab and also changes the search provider to bing.

 Features and instructions:
1.  Configurable tiles that can be used to save your favorite website or showing your previously visited websites.
2. News feed below the tiles. you can configure it under the menu (top left button) under the news source section.
3. Changing wallpaper for your new tab, also can be configured via the settings menu under the wallpaper section.
4. Fully controlled weather widget , you can add multiple locations to be viewed at the same time for weather information.
5. Multiple search engines selector, to decide where do you want to search your terms.

Read the privacy policy here:
https://increditab.com/policies

Terms and conditions here:
https://increditab.com/terms
